titles.title: A bill to provide for a study relating to a consumer price index for the elderly.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 5/28/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Labor to: (1) study the need for, and the desirability of, a price index reflecting changes in the prices of goods and services generally purchased by the elderly; and (2) report to the Congress regarding such study within one year of this Act's enactment.
